LanguageData.AcceleratedGrowthEndAge_desc1: End age of accelerated growth\n Default: 18
LanguageData.BabyInheritPercentage_Desc: The probability of inheriting traits and skills. (not apply to CSL)
LanguageData.GestationPeriodDays_Enable_Desc: Adjust the gestation period of all humanlike races in the game. Applies when the game is loaded. It doesn't work on Rim who are already pregnant.
LanguageData.GestationPeriodDays_desc: Adjust the gestation period of all humanlike races in the game. Applies when the game is loaded. It doesn't work on Rim who are already pregnant.
LanguageData.EnablePostPartum_desc: When enabled, female pawns will enter post partum after giving birth, preventing them from getting pregnant again for two quadrums. RJW Only
LanguageData.CryVolumeSetting_desc: Volume percent for the baby's crying audio clip. 0 to mute.
LanguageData.DebugInfoMessagesEnabled_Title: Enable graphic setting and debug logging
LanguageData.DebugInfoMessagesEnabled_desc: When enabled, will show graphic setting and will post frequent debugging logs to the console.
LanguageData.humanlikeHeadEnabled_desc: The face styles of the Ratkins and the Kurin look like human children.
LanguageData.RabbieChildHeadEnabled_desc: The face styles of the Rabbie look like human children.
